name: Poles World: A War Elegy
description:
Poles World: A War Elegy

Created by Dasong Jin

If you play one game from this page, I hope this is it. Poles World is an epic tale of transformation for the peaceful village farmer Alexei, through unimaginable heartbreak and suffering, to soldier dedicated to defeating the evil dictatorship that forever ruined his life.

Told through detailed anthropomorphic characters in an amazingly realistic 2D world, Poles World uses these devices to deliver impactful storytelling and interactivity that has to be experienced.

Get ready to be immersed in the world of Poles Elegy, just a download click away.
